answers.answer: if the question is  - can you take all these?  The answer is yes, definitely.  I am happy to hear you listened about the serious nature of high blood pressure and are trying to get it under control.  The meds do work, but you might also look at lifestyle changes (exercise, weight, diet, for examples) that can really make a difference in BP if you are concerned about taking too many drugs.
I also have diabetes and have been changing my lifestyle eating habits. Thank you!

question: I went to my family doc today. While I was at the neuro he said I needed to get on blood pressure meds.. so I followed up with him. I started on bp meds this evening. My vitamin D level was also low on the spinal tap, so I started on that. I also decided to start on an anti depressant. I am feeling a overwhelmed and need to get over this hump...I wanted something for fatigue, but he wants me to try all of this first with the avonex... he and the pharmacist said that I can take them together.
title: More than one med at a time?
